title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4202.1 - General policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4202.1 - General policy

State Regulations

General policy on all racing matters is to be declared by
the commission at their meetings or by unanimous consent in writing. The
administration thereof shall be the duty of the chairman acting through the
staff of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4202.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
